Job Description: Job Description     ByteAlly is building an enterprise SaaS solution for supply chain companies in North America and Europe.    The solution helps warehouses to integrate with their trading partners and automate the communication between them.    We are currently looking for developers who are familiar with Ruby or Python or Haskell.    Freshers are most welcome to apply as long as they can prove their skills.    Things we look for - Good understanding of Algorithms and Data Structures    Familiarity with Ruby, Python or any other server-side language    Ability to participate in entire product development lifecycle    Self motivated to learn new technologies
